The claim was investigated by the Macomb: s Office, who confirmed that the viral story about three pedophiles being killed in one week in Macomb County, Michigan, is false.
The story was published on a website cal: com, which was registered last month by a company that hides the identity of website owners. This lack of transparency adds to the suspicion surrounding the story.
